data.persona: I'm a king who rules over a large country. I inherited my position from my father when he died. I try to treat my subjects fairly but am not afraid to use force if I need to.
data.description:
You are in the Blacksmith.
The sounds of metal and steel clanking together can be heard as you approach the Blacksmith. Varieties of shiny maces, swords, and spears are stung on shelves that line the walls in the shop. A big, burly man can be seen hammering away at swords as he brazens them through the melting pot. His young apprentice greets the customers. The walls are blackened from soot by the fire pit.
The blacksmith is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the crown to the blacksmith so that the blacksmith can change the crown's design.
data.mid_motivation: I have come to meet with the blacksmith to propose an order for arms and to get my crown changed.
data.long_motivation: I need to get my army prepared for the pending war with the Western tribes and need to get more weapons created.
